transactionDate.description: Date of the Transaction. By default, current day

scheduleTransactionID.description: If the payment is coming from a schedule

isPastDue.description: If the payment is past due according to the local date

daysPriorToCheckInToCollectRemainder.description: How many days before the check-in a remainder should be sent

externalID.description: The external identifier of the Payment Gateway

encryptionVersion.description: The encryption key version used to encrypt the credentials

currency.description: Currency used for the Statements and Payments

originatingChannelConnectionID.description: ChannelConnection ID that created the booking

rentalAgreementUrl.description: Terms And Conditions Url (Taken from Contract Plan)

channelCollected.description: Tells if the channel will process the payments

paymentCollectionMode.description: Defines how the booking will be paid

pastDueScheduledInstallmentAmount.description: Sum Pending Past Scheduled Installment Payments

pastDueScheduledDepositAmount.description: Sum Pending Past Scheduled Deposit Payment

pastDueScheduledAmount.description: Sum All Pending Past Scheduled Payments

scheduledDate.description:
If PaymentCollectionMode is VirtualCC then the money will be released on this date.
So we have to schedule the transaction to this date or fall back to the payment plan if it's not provided.

notes.description:
Notes
If passed, the system will overwrite the existing value.
If null, the system will keep the existing value.

specialNeeds.description:
Special Needs
If passed, the system will overwrite the existing value.
If null, the system will keep the existing value.

listingID.description:
Listing ID
If passed, the system will be forced to use this.
If null, the system will use the current listing.

locationID.description:
Location ID.
If passed, the system will be forced to use this.
If null, the system will find the first available unit, giving preference to the current one but can end up in change of unit.

threeDSecureData.description:
Holds the pre-authorized ThreeDSecure data in the case of a
"passthrough" 3DS scenario (where the 3DS authorization already occurred in the UI, for example, at the Online Travel Agency website).
            
3DS1 Format:
{
    "eci":"",
    "cavv":"",
    "dsTransID":"",
    "threeDSVersion":""
}
            
3DS2 Format:
{
    "eci":"",
    "cavv":"",
    "xid":"",
    "threeDSVersion":"",
    "exceptionType:""
}
             
"eci": Electronic Commerce Indicator. Provides a code that indicates whether the transaction was processed electronically.
            
Possible "eci" codes:
             
"02" or "05" - Fully authenticated transaction
             
"01" or "06" - Attempted authentication transaction
             
"00" or "07" - Non 3D Secure transaction
             
"cavv": The CAVV is used to confirm that an authentication, or proof of an attempted authentication, was conducted.
             
"dsTransID": 3DS1 only. The transaction identifier assigned by the Directory Server (base64 encoded, 20 bytes in a decoded form).
             
"xid": 3DS2 only. The transaction identifier assigned by the Directory Server (base64 encoded, 20 bytes in a decoded form).
            
"threeDSVersion": provides the 3-D Secure version used to process the transaction
             
"exceptionType": 3DS2 only. Provides the reason why 3DS2 authentication was bypassed

locationID.description: Location ID. If passed, the system will be forced to use this.

externalBookingID.description: External identifier set by the Channel (KVRS AltID)

channelCollected.description: Tells if the channel will process the payments

paymentCollectionMode.description: Defines how the booking will be paid

paymentCollectionScheduledDate.description:
If PaymentCollectionMode is VirtualCC then the money will be released on this date.
So we have to schedule the transaction to this date or fall back to the payment plan if it's not provided.

PostBookingRequest.description: Api Model for posting a new booking without a previous quote (if the channel connection allows it)

gatewayErrorCode.description: The original message from the payment gateway

gatewayErrorMessage.description: The original error message from the payment gateway

code.description: Unified error code (flattened Core API, KVRS and Pro errors) constructed by Kigo

message.description: Unified error message constructed by Kigo

PostBookingResponse.description: Response to POST /bookings and POST /quotes/{guid}/book actions

addedPayments.description:
Payments that were processed only for this request
We stop at the first process error, so this will include all successful and at most 1 failed payment attempt

pastDueScheduledInstallmentAmount.description: Sum of Pending Past Scheduled Installment Payments

pastDueScheduledDepositAmount.description: Sum of Pending Past Schedule Deposit Payments

pastDueScheduledAmount.description: Sum All Pending Past Scheduled Payments

externalID.description: External ID (Represents the Primary Key of KVRS)

lastUpdatedDate.description: Last time the Booking was modified

type.description: Keep in sync with VRX.Prod.Entities LocationBooking Types

status.description:
Keep in sync with VRX.Prod.Entities.LocationBooking.Statuses
Commented statuses are not used in CM

acceptedPaymentMethods.description: Credit card brands which the PMC accepts for booking payment

isEnabled.description: True if the Channel Connection is enabled

modifiedDate.description: DateTime of the last change to this Channel Connection

externalID.description: The Unique identifier of the channel connection from the PMS (e.g. SyncLinkID in KVRS)

requiresCreditCard.description: If true, a Credit Card is required for a Booking

isEnabled.description: True if the Channel Connection is enabled

modifiedDate.description: DateTime of the last change to this Channel Connection

externalID.description: The Unique identifier of the channel connection from the PMS (e.g. SyncLinkID in KVRS)

requiresCreditCard.description: If true, a Credit Card is required for a Booking

showLocation.description: Defines if the exact location of listings should be visible

associatedChannelConnectionIDs.description: Channel Connection IDs associated to the Listing

listingOrigin.description: Tells from where the Listing will be created and managed

daysPriorToCheckInMin.description: It is possible to book until X days before the check-in

daysPriorToCheckInMax.description: It is possible to book at max X days before the check-in

hoursPriorToCheckIn.description: If the booking is made the same day, check the max time the booking can be made

startDate.description: Minimum days between reservations effective start date

endDate.description: Minimum days between reservations effective end date

isRequired.description: When set to true strict LOS selection will be applied

startDate.description: Start date of the period when the rule is applied

endDate.description: End date of the period when the rule is applied

closedToArrival.description: Days of the week when cannot check in

closedToDeparture.description: Days of the week when cannot check out

rateAdjustmentOverrides.description: Seasonal rate adjustments that override rate adjustments

guestRangeMin.description:
Guest Range min (INCLUSIVE)
In ExtraPerson Fee, starting from this number a person is considered Extra

losMin.description:
It is used to define a range of nights in which the fee applies (e.g.: Night Tax will be applied if your LOS is at
least 2 nights)

losMax.description:
It is used to define a range of nights in which the fee applies (e.g.: Night Tax won't be applied if your LOS is
more than 7 nights)

daysPriorToCheckinToCollectRemainder.description: How many days before the check-in a remainder should be sent

isDefault.description: True if it is the default plan setting, false otherwise

registrationNumber.description: Unit Permit or Tax ID (also could be Vacation Rental Registration Number)

id.description:
v1: id will be set.
v2: id will be null.

text.description:
v1: text will be set.
v2: text will be null.

code.description:
v1: code will be null.
v2: code will be set.

associatedChannelConnectionIDs.description: Channel Connection IDs associated to the Listing

acceptedPaymentMethods.description: Credit card brands which the PMC accepts for booking payment

squareFeet.description:
Unit size in square feet (it is the responsibility of the consumer to convert it
if for example they wanted to display square meters.

categoryType.description: Category type of the property (e.g. Condo, House, Townhouse)

sunriseDate.description: The date when the listing can start being occupied

sunsetDate.description: The date when the listing must end being occupied

listingOrigin.description: Tells from where the Listing will be created and managed

showLocation.description: Defines if the exact location of listings should be visible

promotionSettings.description: All promotions the listing is associated to

closedToArrival.description: Is closed to Arrival (check-in not allowed) (but it can be still available)

closedToDeparture.description: Is closed to the departure (check-out not allowed) (but it can be still available)

isAvailable.description: True if the day is available for booking, false otherwise

setupError.description: Optional Error Code related to the Listing setup that is checked

constraintError.description: Optional Error Code related to setup rules

price.description: True if Price has changed, false otherwise

availability.description: True if Availability has changed, false otherwise

content.description: True if Content has changed, false otherwise

status.description: True if Status has changed, false otherwise

channelConnectionID.description: Channel Connection ID (compound key) where Price, Availability or Content has changed

listingID.description: Listing ID (compound key) where Price, Availability or Content has changed

nextModifiedAfter.description: Next TimeStamp to be used for the next call

value.description: Listings where Price, Availability or Content has changed

isAvailable.description: If there is Availability and no errors occurred

setupError.description: Optional Error Code related to the Listing setup that is checked

constraintError.description: Optional Error Code related to setup rules

CheckAvailabilityOutput.description: A Quote contains error information, property data, and a statement

computeDefaultPlanOnly.description: Whether all plans or just the default one should be given (optional, defaults to false)

requestedOptionalFees.description: The optional fee(s) that you want to consider in the quote

isDefault.description: True if it is the default plan setting, false otherwise

rentalAgreementUrl.description: Terms And Conditions Url (Taken from Contract Plan)

guid.description: Guid used for referencing the Quote in the call for book

validUntil.description: Last date the Quote may be converted to a Booking

requestedOptionalFees.description: Guid(s) of the optional fee(s) that you want to consider in the quote

Quote.description: A Quote contains error information, property data, and a statement

externalBookingID.description: External ID coming from the Channel

paymentCollectionMode.description: Defines how the booking will be paid
